Because I am hard,
you will not like me.
But the more you hate me,
the more you will learn.
I am hard, but I am fair.

I Invent, Transform, Create, And Destroy For A Living.

"Everything that I don't agree with is a conspiracy."

I'm real good at hating

servum bonum
